subject: How to test assertXXX() method for multi set of data
msgSnippet: Hi All, Implementation method: boolean aMethod(int a, int b) { ... return bval; } I want to test above method for n number of valid data sets. But whenever I
messageBody:
Hi All,

Implementation method:

boolean aMethod(int a, int b)
{
----------;
----------;
----------;
return bval;
}

I want to test above method for n number of valid data sets. But whenever I
am testing it by using following method and if I got any unexpected result
in first data set then its not testing for remaining data sets.

public void testaMethod()
{
int a[] = new int[10];
int b[] = new int[10];
for(int i =0; i< 10; i++)
{
try
{
assertTrue(obj.aMethod(a[i], b[i])
}
catch(Exception e)
{}
}

Thanks & Regards,

Anil Jadhav
